title: Planet Entity Schema
description: Planet entity definition - extracted from game-state.json for context window optimization. See schemas/formats.json for format specifications.

id.description: Unique planet identifier in format 'type-index' (e.g., '2-1' for planet type 2, index 1). Type 2 = Planet.

maxOre.description: Maximum ore capacity (string representation of integer, typically '5')

creator.description: Blockchain address that created this planet

owner.description: Player ID who owns this planet, empty string if unowned. Format: 'type-index' (e.g., '1-11' for player type 1, index 11). Type 1 = Player.

space.description: Space slot array (4 slots, struct IDs or empty strings)

items.description: Struct identifier in format 'type-index' (e.g., '5-42' for struct type 5, index 42). Type 5 = Struct.

air.description: Air slot array (4 slots, struct IDs or empty strings)

items.description: Struct identifier in format 'type-index' (e.g., '5-42' for struct type 5, index 42). Type 5 = Struct.

land.description: Land slot array (4 slots, struct IDs or empty strings)

items.description: Struct identifier in format 'type-index' (e.g., '5-42' for struct type 5, index 42). Type 5 = Struct.

water.description: Water slot array (4 slots, struct IDs or empty strings)

items.description: Struct identifier in format 'type-index' (e.g., '5-42' for struct type 5, index 42). Type 5 = Struct.

structs:verification.note: API response schema. Starting properties verified: maxOre=5, slots=4 each. For code-based field definitions with formulas, see schemas/entities.json#/definitions/Planet
